properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Warning issued February 14 at 3:21PM EST until February 15 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Significant lakeshore flooding expected, with waves
building up to 12 feet. In addition, there may be some loose
ice near the shoreline that could push onshore, potentially
causing additional concerns for lakeshore flooding and shoreline
impacts.

* WHERE...Southern Schoolcraft County.

* WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 4 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Numerous roads closed and low lying property including
parking lots, lawns, and homes and businesses will be inundated
near the lake. Some shoreline erosion will occur.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM EST SATURDAY
